titles.title: Ethical Standards for Federal Prosecutors Act of 1997
To amend title 28, United States Code, to require prosecutors in the Department of Justice to be ethical.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Ethical Standards for Federal Prosecutors Act of 1997 - Amends the Federal judicial code to subject a U.S. attorney to State laws and rules, and local Federal court rules, to the same extent and in the same manner as other attorneys engaging in duties in that State.
